name: tattooed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having a permanent image, pattern, or word created on the skin using needles and ink: a man with heavily tattooed arms She is tattooed and has several piercings. See
tattoo
More examplesFewer examplesThe backs of both his hands are extensively tattooed. She has a tattooed face. A pierced and tattooed man quietly bows his head at a noisy lunch counter.The bodyguard, who goes by the name Grizzly, weighs 270 pounds, with a shaved head and tattooed arms.Mendez is tattooed and sports a jewel under his bottom lip.
